data.name: Birsa Munda
data.bio: A passionate naturalist and tribal culture expert with 15 years of experience guiding tourists through Jharkhand's forests and villages. Specializes in wildlife photography tours and tribal heritage walks.

tours.title: Betla Wildlife Safari
tours.description: Full day jeep safari in Betla National Park with expert wildlife spotting

tours.title: Tribal Village Experience
tours.description: Immersive visit to Munda and Oraon villages with cultural performances

data.name: Savitri Devi
data.bio: Expert on Jharkhand's religious sites and pilgrimage routes. Fluent in Sanskrit and knowledgeable about ancient temple architecture and rituals.

tours.title: Baidyanath Jyotirlinga Darshan
tours.description: Complete temple tour with rituals, history, and spiritual guidance

tours.title: Sacred Sites of Jharkhand
tours.description: Multi-day pilgrimage covering major temples and holy sites

data.name: Ranjit Oraon
data.bio: Adventure sports enthusiast and certified trekking guide. Expert in organizing multi-day treks, rock climbing, and rappelling expeditions in Jharkhand's hill regions.

tours.title: Netarhat Sunrise Trek
tours.description: Early morning trek to Magnolia Point for the famous Netarhat sunrise

tours.title: Lodh Falls Adventure
tours.description: Full day trek to Jharkhand's highest waterfall with swimming

data.name: Anita Mahato
data.bio: Craft historian and artisan community expert. Passionate about preserving Jharkhand's traditional art forms and connecting tourists with local artisans.

tours.title: Sohrai Art Workshop
tours.description: Hands-on experience learning traditional Sohrai wall painting

tours.title: Artisan Village Trail
tours.description: Visit pottery, weaving, and metalwork artisan communities

data.name: Kumar Santosh
data.bio: Wildlife photographer and forest ranger (retired). Deep knowledge of Jharkhand's flora and fauna with special expertise in bird watching.

tours.title: Dalma Elephant Trail
tours.description: Track wild elephants in their natural habitat with photography opportunities

tours.title: Dawn Bird Watching
tours.description: Early morning bird watching tour with species identification
